TextLibrary.Text: You found the next one of The Lost?
You found the next one of The Lost?
I did, and he taught me how to avoid Frigate Class ships.
I did, and he taught me how to avoid Frigate Class ships.
You still don't think they're traitors?
You still don't think they're traitors?
No. They disagreed with the MRI Breeding program, and when they voiced their concerns they felt their lives were in danger. They fled and hid on a number of moons. They were just trying to stay safe.
No. They disagreed with the MRI Breeding program, and when they voiced their concerns they felt their lives were in danger. They fled and hid on a number of moons. They were just trying to stay safe.
